channel.title: Tops on Rich Youngkin
channel.description: Recent content in Tops on Rich Youngkin

item.description: Iâ€™ve been architecting, designing and implementing distributed applications since 1991, initially client-server applications written in C++ and Java deployed to UNIX/LINUX platforms. Beginning in 2011 I began working with highly-scaleable/highly-available microservice applications using Java, Erlang, and since 2015, Go. My current interests are in the areas of highly scalable/highly available distributed applications, Docker, Kubernetes, cloud architectures, and using Raspberry Pi clusters as a home lab. My blog reflects these interests1.
